variants.Description in input context: This variant leads to a non-conservative amino acid substitution.

Material used.Description: RNA was extracted from patient-derived fibroblasts.

Readout description.Result Description: The PINK1 transcript levels were significantly reduced (p<0.01) in fibroblasts carrying the NM_004936.3:c.1985A>T variant.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent cell lines from different patients were used as biological replicates.

Technical replicates.Description: Each RT-qPCR reaction was performed in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Fibroblasts from healthy controls were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: No-template control (NTC) was included to rule out contamination.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA followed by a post-hoc Tukey test for multiple comparisons.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: PINK1 transcript levels greater than 1.5 relative to controls.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: PINK1 transcript levels below 1.5 relative to controls.
